original_text: I will go before thee, and make the crooked places straight: I will break in pieces the gates of brass, and cut in sunder the bars of iron:
korean_text: 내가 너보다 앞서 가서 험한 곳을 평탄하게 하며 놋문을 쳐서 부수며 쇠빗장을 꺾고

sentences.original_text: and make the crooked places straight
I will break in pieces gates of brass
and cut in sunder bars of iron
